remarks: The direct product of a collection of direct products.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dprd2d2.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( i e. I /\ j e. J ) ) -> S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
dprd2d2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. I ) -> G dom DProd ( j e. J |-> S ) ) $.
dprd2d2.3 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd ( i e. I |-> ( G DProd ( j e. J |-> S ) ) ) ) $.
dprd2d2 $p |- ( ph -> ( G dom DProd ( i e. I , j e. J |-> S ) /\ ( G DProd ( i e. I , j e. J |-> S ) ) = ( G DProd ( i e. I |-> ( G DProd ( j e. J |-> S ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d G i j $.
$d I i j $.
$d J j $.
$d i j ph $.
